channel.title: [Glitch] RPG 1st Rocket missing
channel.description: A very minor and nitpicky glitch, but I noticed when you first pick up the RPG, there is no rocket loaded in it. When you shoot the first rocket and reload, THEN the rocket it actually in the RPG viewmodel.

item.title: [Glitch] RPG 1st Rocket missing
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
A very minor and nitpicky glitch, but I noticed when you first pick up the RPG, there is no rocket loaded in it. When you shoot the first rocket and reload, THEN the rocket it actually in the RPG viewmodel.

Read full topic
